mainText:
Dear Representatives at Apple, I send my condolences to Apple over their loss. I've had my 
Macbook and iPhone since 7th grade (I am a Junior in High School now), 
and I must say that if I didn't have either, I would not have been as 
productive as I am now! Steve really changed the world in many aspects, 
and I feel that without him, the world wouldn't have been just the same. 
Rest in Peace Steve, you shall not be forgotten.
author: Ashvik
